name: The Croods: Prehistoric Party!
overview: The Croods: Prehistoric Party! combines the ultimate fun of a family party game with Croods-style action as you journey through 30 unique and addictive mini-games. You’ll encounter spectacular environments and never-before-seen creatures in this comical and rough and tumble Croods-style competition. Game Features: • Compete in 30 unique and addictive Croods-themed Party games!• Play as any one of the lovable Croods family members – Grug, Ugga, Eep, Thunk, Sandy, Gran and Guy!• Features spectacular landscapes and never-before-seen creatures from the film!
